summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Government Performance and Financial Management Committee of the City of Dallas will convene on June 24, 2024, at 1:30 PM. This meeting will be held both via video conference and in-person at City Hall, allowing public attendance virtually and in person. The meeting will be broadcasted live for broader accessibility.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The agenda includes the approval of minutes from the previous meeting, a review of city real estate for development opportunities, and discussions on the upcoming State Legislative Program for the 89th Legislative Session. Additionally, the committee will address the planned budget for FY 2024-25, including presentations from various city departments.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include a Budget Accountability Report, a Technology Accountability Report, and performance measures for Dallas365, all as of May 31, 2024. The committee will also consider a resolution for selecting an underwriting syndicate for bond issuance related to the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center and Fair Park, as well as a grant and loan proposal for flood infrastructure funding from the Texas Water Development Board.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks approval for the meeting minutes, the selection of an underwriting syndicate for bond issuance, and the extension of commercial paper notes related to the waterworks and sewer system. Additionally, discussions may lead to decisions regarding real estate negotiations and legislative priorities for the upcoming session.
